NEW RETVAL SET RETVAL="" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_"<script language=""JavaScript"" type=""text/javascript"">" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_"function newModalDialog(url,para,height,width,resize) {" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" if (url==null) url='';" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" if (para==null) para='';" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" if (height==null || height=='') height=450;" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" if (width==null || width=='') width=300;" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" if (resize==1) resize='yes'; else resize='no';" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" if (url != '') {" ;SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" if (window.navigator.appVersion.indexOf(""MSIE"")!=-1) {" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" if (document.all) {" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" url = url + '&YSEC='+new Date().getSeconds() + '&YRANDOM='+Math.random();" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" var result = window.showModalDialog (url,para,'DialogHeight: ' + height + 'px; DialogWidth: ' + width + 'px; resizable: ' + resize + '; status: no; center: yes; help: no;');" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" return result;" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" }" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" else {" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" modalDialog = window.open(String(url),'','width=' + width + ', height=' + height + ', resizeable=' + resize + ', status=no, directories=no, menubar=no, titlebar=no, toolbar=no, dependent=yes');" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" if (para != '') modalDialog.dialogArguments=para;" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" return '';" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" }" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" }" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" }" SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR ;DO //HOLT FENSTER ZURÃœCK IN VORDERGRUND WENN NICHT MODAL WINDOW -> PROBLEM: HINTERGRUNDFENSTER WECHSELT AUCH . SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_"function keepFocus() {" . SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" if (modalDialog!=null && !(modalDialog.closed)) {" . SET RETVAL=RETVAL_YCR_" self.blur();" .
